channel.title: Adam Devine on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in Adam Devine on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: Sold-Out ‘Three’s Company’ Reading Starring Adam Devine and Kaley Cuoco Honors John Ritter’s Legacy
item.description: The event is part of the yearly fundraiser for The John Ritter Foundation, spearheaded by the comedy icon’s widow, Amy Yasbeck.

item.title: Sold-Out ‘Three’s Company’ Reading Starring Adam Devine and Kaley Cuoco Honors John Ritter’s Legacy
item.description: The event is part of the yearly fundraiser for The John Ritter Foundation, spearheaded by the comedy icon’s widow, Amy Yasbeck.

item.title: ‘Fixed’ Review: Genndy Tartakovsky’s Netflix Animated Feature Is a Hilariously Dirty Delight
item.description: Adam DeVine, Idris Elba and Kathryn Hahn are among the voice cast for the comedy about a pet dog who enlists his canine friends for one last wild evening before he’s taken to get neutered.
